title: BlackRock is working on a rival takeover bid for Credit Suisse, Financial Times reports
description: It follows an earlier report in the Financial Times that UBS is in talks to take over all or part of the embattled Swiss lender.

title: Fail or sale? What could be next for stricken Credit Suisse
description: JPMorgan's Kian Abouhossein described a Credit Suisse takeover by UBS as "the more likely scenario."
